solution_line_template: He saw {total_vehicles} total vehicles because {num_trucks} plus {num_cars} equals <<{num_trucks}+{num_cars}={total_vehicles}>>{total_vehicles}.
He saw {total_wheels} wheels because {total_vehicles} times {wheels_per_vehicle} equals <<{total_vehicles}*{wheels_per_vehicle}={total_wheels}>>{total_wheels}.
